overview: Once occupation photographer Su Dong (Alex Fong decoration), after an overseas assignment scarred, exhausted. After he returned alone to Yunnan tourism trip, and met the beautiful airline stewardess Gu Ting on the way (Li Xiaoran). The heart is very lonely men and women traveling with a companion, inevitably leads to love flame, however accidental fires broke everything, seems to indicate that the emotional communication they are not smooth. After returning to Beijing, Guting see Su Dong girlfriend station scene, cheated, contradiction at the same time with the mother for many years has prompted her to seek a new life. On the other hand, the Soviet Union and east end and his girlfriend part company each going his own way, he Gu Ting think constantly of, finally found the clue in a fashion magazine.
title: To Love or Not
